bearerAuth.description: Enter your Bearer token in the format: Bearer <token>

phone.description: Phone number of the contact in international format
Phone number of the contact in international format

name.description: Updated name of the contact group

match_criteria.description: Criteria describing how trigger matches (e.g., exact, contains)

response.description: Reply content sent when trigger matches

phone.description: Recipient phone number in international format

media_type.description: Type of media (image, video, document, audio, sticker)

media_url.description: Public URL where the media can be fetched

caption.description: Optional caption to include with media

file_name.description: Optional file name to display for documents

phone.description: Recipient phone number in international format including country code

template.description: Template payload defining which approved WhatsApp template to use

name.description: Unique template name as approved in WhatsApp Business Manager

components.description: Array of template components (header, body, button) with parameter substitutions

parameters.description: Parameter values that will replace placeholders in the component text

text.description: Value to substitute for the matching placeholder

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the response

success.description: Indicates if the template message request was accepted for processing

messaging_product.description: Messaging product (e.g. whatsapp) through which message was sent

wa_id.description: WhatsApp ID associated with the contact

message_status.description: Initial delivery status for the message

contact.description: UUID or identifier of the contact

note.description: Free-form note text to attach to the contact

user_id.description: User ID to assign the ticket to

counts.description: Map of status name to count

user_id.description: Filter counts for tickets assigned to this user (optional)

status.description: Status to filter by or aggregate
